exec badger xml sitemap.xml

exec badger xml --schema=sitemap.xsd sitemap.xml

exec badger xml --schema=siteindex.xsd siteindex.xml

<foo></foo>

-- unclosed.xml --
<bad>

-- sitemap.xml --
<urlset
		xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
		xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9"
		xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">
		<url><loc>https://www.badger.sh/index.html</loc></url>
		<url><loc>https://www.badger.sh/faq.html</loc></url>
</urlset>

-- siteindex.xml --

<sitemapindex

	<sitemap>
		<loc>https://www.fileformat.info/info/charset/sitemap.xml</loc>
	</sitemap>
	<sitemap>
		<loc>https://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/version/sitemap.xml</loc>
	</sitemap>
</sitemapindex>
